ygData.subject: RE: Places to for a low level cleric to hunt (used t o be unrest)
ygData.msgSnippet: Befallen is not bad.  You can group and go to the second level.  The evac route out of befallen is hard, so be careful. I am also 14th level, and spend a good
ygData.messageBody:
Befallen is not bad. You can group and go to the second level. The evac
route out of befallen is hard, so be careful.

I am also 14th level, and spend a good part of my time in Beholder. In a
group, you can fight elders, gorge minotaurs, and even the occasional chasm
mino. Stay away form evil eyes for now.. Most mobs in there give good xp,
but only the eyes give decent loot. Plus the eveac routes are fairly easy.

-----Original Message-----
From: FalornEQ@... [mailto:FalornEQ@...]
Sent: 1999/11/09 3:53 PM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Places to for a low level cleric to hunt (used
to be unrest)


From: FalornEQ@...

I was wondering where would a level 14 cleric have a good time fighting,
other than in Nro where i am now?
